metadata.Title: CVE-2018-8098 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: Integer overflow in the index.c:read_entry() function while decompressing acompressed prefix length in libgit2 before v0.26.2 allows an attacker tocause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via a crafted repositoryindex file.

criterions.comment: libgit2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
